BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 240159Z JAN
   BY M/V NPS VERITAS VIKING TOWING EIGHT 3.5 MILE
   LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   25-02.20S 041-23.11W, 24-23.30S 041-59.03W,
   24-31.17S 041-56.14W.
   SIX MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 240259Z JAN.
